subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; “year”
: {{bor|zh|mkh|-}} ({{zh-ref|Benedict, 1990}}; {{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}): compare {{cog|mkh-pro|*cn₁am|*cn₁am ~ *cn₁aam|[[year]]}}, whence {{cog|km|ឆ្នាំ}}, {{cog|mnw|သၞာံ|tr=hnam}}, {{cog|vi|năm}}.
